title: The Lima
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lunchroom/deli with lots of vegan choices such as soups, sandwiches, cake and fresh juices/smoothies. Can be very busy, reservations recommended.  Mostly organic. Healthy food and sustainability are important to the owners.
